To deposit cryptocurrency into your Ndax account using your desktop, follow these steps:

  1. Click Wallet or the wallet icon in the left-hand sidebar.
  2. Select the cryptocurrency you want to deposit.
  3. Click Receive.
  4. Choose the network that matches your sending wallet.
  5. Your Ndax wallet address and, if required, a destination tag or memo will be displayed.

⚠️ Important: If a destination tag or memo is shown, it must be included with your transfer.
Without it, your deposit may not be credited to your account and could result in delays in receiving your funds.

7. Copy the wallet address and tag/memo (if applicable), or scan the QR code using your external wallet to complete the transfer.
